awd_titl_txt: U.S.-Brazil (STI) Workshop on Natural Products Chemistry;   Sao Paulo, Brazil, May 31 - June 2, 1990
awd_abstract_narration: This U.S.-Brazil Science and Technology Initiative (STI) award                  will support a program planning workshop in the area of natural                 products chemistry.  The purpose of the workshop, organized by                  Professor Bruce Jarvis of the University of Maryland and                        Professor Otto Gottlieb of the University of Sao Paulo, Brazil,                 is to stimulate cooperative research between U.S. and Brazilian                 chemists.  As such, the workshop will address the following                     topics: diagnostic of on-going research efforts in both the U.S.                and Brazil in the area of natural products chemistry; identifi-                 cation of areas of common interests and likely future collabo-                  rators; and organization of joint planning activities for                       cooperation in the short, medium, and long term.
org_div_long_name: Office of International Science and Engineering
